ExportJournalHtml.name: Export Journal to HTML
ExportJournalHtml.description: A system agnostic way of exporting FoundryVTT Journal entries to HTML for printing or generating a PDF.
ExportJournalHtml.warn_electron: Export Journal to HTML does not work within the standalone FVTT Application. Please use a browser.
ExportJournalHtml.opt_remove_background_: Removes all standard background images to show a white background. If some still show, use the Custom CSS option to add any extra rules needed for your setup.
ExportJournalHtml.opt_custom_css_hint: Add your own override styles to the Journal on export.
ExportJournalHtml.opt_print_dialog_hint: Show the browser Print dialog automatically on export.
ExportJournalHtml.opt_popup_hint: Disabled will open export in a new tab, enabled will open in a popup.
